coreFeatures.description: Your training in warfare has granted you the following benefits:

benefits.name: Weapon Master
benefits.description: At the start of each of your turns, you can freely swap any Weapon you're currently wielding in each hand for any other Weapon without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

benefits.name: Maneuver Master
benefits.description: You learn 2 Maneuvers of your choice.

benefits.name: Technique Master
benefits.description: You learn 1 Technique of your choice. Once per Combat, when you perform a Technique you can reduce its SP cost by 1.

coreFeatures.description: You stand ready for Combat at any moment, granting you the following benefits:

benefits.name: Combat Readiness
benefits.description: At the start of your first turn in Combat, you gain one of the following benefits: Brace (You gain the benefits of the Dodge Action and ADV on the next Save you make until the end of Combat) or Advance (You gain the benefits of the Move Action and ADV on the next Physical Check you make until the end of Combat).

benefits.name: Second Wind
benefits.description: Once per Combat when you start your turn Bloodied, you can regain 2 HP and 1 SP.

coreFeatures.description: You can spend 1 minute observing or interacting with a creature out of Combat (or spend 1 AP in Combat) to learn information about its physical capabilities compared to your own. Choose one of the following stats of the creature to assess: Might, Agility, PD, AD, and HP. Make a DC 10 Knowledge or Insight Check (your choice). Success: You learn if the chosen stat is higher, lower, or the same as yours.
When you roll for Initiative, and at the end of each of your turns, you gain a d8 Tactical Die if you don't already have one. You can spend a Tactical Die to gain one of the following Tactics:

choices.prompt: Choose a Tactic to use your Tactical Die on.

options.name: Assault
options.description: When you make a Martial Attack, you can add the die to the Attack's result.

options.name: Deflect
options.description: When you are Attacked, you can subtract the die from the Attack's result.

coreFeatures.description: You gain 1 Talent of your choice. If the Talent has any prerequisites, you must meet those prerequisites to choose that Talent.

features.description: Your warrior spirit refuses to yield in battle. You gain the following benefits:

benefits.name: Adrenaline Boost
benefits.description: When you use your Second Wind, you gain a +5 bonus to Attack Checks you make until the end of your turn.

benefits.name: Cut Through
benefits.description: Your Martial Attacks that score Heavy Hits ignore the target's Physical damage Resistances.

benefits.name: Unyielding Spirit
benefits.description: While Bloodied, you gain 1 Temp HP at the start of each of your turns.

features.description: You ignore the penalties of Forced March and being Encumbered (but not Heavily Encumbered).

benefits.name: Steadfast Defender
benefits.description: You can use your Deflect Tactic against any Attack that targets a creature within your Melee Range.

benefits.name: Defensive Bash
benefits.description: When you use a Defensive Maneuver as a Reaction to an Attack from a creature within 1 Space of you, the attacker must make a Physical Save against your Attack Check. Save Failure: The target is pushed 1 Space away or Taunted by you until the end of its next turn (your choice).

benefits.name: Not on my Watch
benefits.description: Creatures Taunted by you deal 1 less damage to targets within 1 Space of you.

features.description: During a Long Rest, if you spend both 4 hour periods doing Light Activity, you have ADV on the Might Save you make to avoid gaining Exhaustion. Additionally, the Save DC doesn't increase on a Failure.
